languages.text: "На одном из местных миров обнаружено странное сооружение, которое является источником слабого излучения неопознанной природы. За исключением этого авгуры не отметили никакой иной активности на поверхности планеты, которую по совокупности признаков скорее можно отнести к категории мертвых миров. Возможна высадка рядом с постройкой — если вы того пожелаете".

"A peculiar structure was discovered on the surface of one of the local worlds. It is emitting weak radiation of an unidentified nature, but aside from that, the augurs have failed to register any activity on the surface of the planet. In conjunction with its other features, it would be feasible to classify this planet as a dead world. It is possible to land next to the edifice if you deem this necessary."
languages.original_text: "На одном из местных миров обнаружено странное сооружение, которое является источником слабого излучения неопознанной природы. За исключением этого авгуры не отметили никакой иной активности на поверхности планеты, которую по совокупности признаков скорее можно отнести к категории мертвых миров. Возможна высадка рядом с постройкой — если вы того пожелаете".

traits.locale_text: "A peculiar structure was discovered on the surface of one of the local worlds. It is emitting weak radiation of unidentified nature, but aside from that the augurs failed to register any activity on the surface of the planet that would otherwise be classified as a Dead World due to the combination of its other features. It is possible to land next to the edifice if you deem this necessary."

"A peculiar structure was discovered on the surface of one of the local worlds. In conjunction with its other features, it would be feasible to classify this planet as a dead world. It is possible to land next to the edifice if you deem this necessary."

languages.text: « Une structure singulière a été découverte à la surface de l'une des planètes locales. Elle émet des radiations d'intensité faible et de nature inconnue, mais en dehors de cela, les augures n'ont détecté aucune autre forme d'activité notable. En prenant en considération les autres caractéristiques de ce monde, il semble tout à fait justifié de le classer dans la catégorie des mondes morts. Un atterrissage à proximité de l'édifice reste envisageable, si tel est votre souhait. »
languages.original_text: "A peculiar structure was discovered on the surface of one of the local worlds. It is emitting weak radiation of an unidentified nature, but aside from that, the augurs have failed to register any activity on the surface of the planet. In conjunction with its other features, it would be feasible to classify this planet as a dead world. It is possible to land next to the edifice if you deem this necessary."

traits.locale_text: « Une structure singulière a été découverte à la surface de l'une des planètes locales. Elle émet des radiations d'intensité faible et de nature inconnue, mais en dehors de cela, les augures n'ont détecté aucune autre forme d'activité notable. En prenant en considération les autres caractéristiques de ce monde, il semble tout à fait justifié de le classer dans la catégorie des mondes morts. Un atterrissage à proximité de l'édifice reste envisageable, si tel est votre souhait. »

languages.text: “我们在当地某个世界表面发现了某种奇特的结构，正在不断发出性质不明的微弱辐射，但除此之外，俄歇矩阵未能在行星表面发现任何活动迹象。结合那颗行星的其他特征来看，应该可以把那个世界归类为死寂世界。如果您认为有必要调查的话，可以降落在那座建筑旁边。”
languages.original_text: "A peculiar structure was discovered on the surface of one of the local worlds. It is emitting weak radiation of an unidentified nature, but aside from that, the augurs have failed to register any activity on the surface of the planet. In conjunction with its other features, it would be feasible to classify this planet as a dead world. It is possible to land next to the edifice if you deem this necessary."

traits.locale_text: “我们在当地某个世界表面发现了某种奇特的结构，正在不断发出性质不明的微弱辐射，但除此之外，俄歇矩阵未能在行星表面发现任何活动迹象。结合那颗行星的其他特征来看，应该可以把那个世界归类为死寂世界。如果您认为有必要调查的话，可以降落在那座建筑旁边。”

languages.text: "Auf der Oberfläche einer lokalen Welt wurde ein eigenartiges Gebilde entdeckt. Es sondert eine schwache Strahlung unbekannter Art aus. Abgesehen davon konnten die Auguren jedoch auf der Oberfläche des Planeten keinerlei Aktivitäten feststellen. In der Gesamtschau aller Eigenschaften ließe sich dieses Planet wohl als tote Welt klassifizieren. Falls Ihr es für nötig haltet, können wir neben diesem Gebäude landen."
languages.original_text: "A peculiar structure was discovered on the surface of one of the local worlds. It is emitting weak radiation of an unidentified nature, but aside from that, the augurs have failed to register any activity on the surface of the planet. In conjunction with its other features, it would be feasible to classify this planet as a dead world. It is possible to land next to the edifice if you deem this necessary."

traits.locale_text: "Auf der Oberfläche einer lokalen Welt wurde ein eigenartiges Gebilde entdeckt. Es sondert eine schwache Strahlung unbekannter Art aus. Abgesehen davon konnten die Auguren jedoch auf der Oberfläche des Planeten keinerlei Aktivitäten feststellen. In der Gesamtschau aller Eigenschaften ließe sich dieses Planet wohl als tote Welt klassifizieren. Falls Ihr es für nötig haltet, können wir neben diesem Gebäude landen."

languages.text: «Se ha descubierto una pintoresca estructura en la superficie de uno de los mundos cercanos. Emite una débil radiación de naturaleza desconocida, pero, aparte de eso, los augures no han registrado ninguna otra actividad en este planeta. Teniendo en cuenta otras de sus características, este planeta podría clasificarse como un mundo muerto. Si lo cree necesario, podríamos aterrizar cerca de la construcción».
languages.original_text: "A peculiar structure was discovered on the surface of one of the local worlds. It is emitting weak radiation of an unidentified nature, but aside from that, the augurs have failed to register any activity on the surface of the planet. In conjunction with its other features, it would be feasible to classify this planet as a dead world. It is possible to land next to the edifice if you deem this necessary."

traits.locale_text: «Se ha descubierto una pintoresca estructura en la superficie de uno de los mundos cercanos. Emite una débil radiación de naturaleza desconocida, pero, aparte de eso, los augures no han registrado ninguna otra actividad en este planeta. Teniendo en cuenta otras de sus características, este planeta podría clasificarse como un mundo muerto. Si lo cree necesario, podríamos aterrizar cerca de la construcción».

languages.text: 「現地惑星の地上の一箇所で、独特な構造物を発見しました。性質が謎の微弱な放射線を放出していますが、それは別にして、スキャナーは惑星の表面でいかなる活動も記録できていません。その他の特徴と組み合わせて、この惑星を死滅惑星に分類できそうです。必要と判断される場合は、構造物の隣に着陸することが可能です」
languages.original_text: "A peculiar structure was discovered on the surface of one of the local worlds. It is emitting weak radiation of an unidentified nature, but aside from that, the augurs have failed to register any activity on the surface of the planet. In conjunction with its other features, it would be feasible to classify this planet as a dead world. It is possible to land next to the edifice if you deem this necessary."

traits.locale_text: 「現地惑星の地上の一箇所で、独特な構造物を発見しました。性質が謎の微弱な放射線を放出していますが、それは別にして、スキャナーは惑星の表面でいかなる活動も記録できていません。その他の特徴と組み合わせて、この惑星を死滅惑星に分類できそうです。必要と判断される場合は、構造物の隣に着陸することが可能です」

languages.text: "Yerel dünyaların birinin yüzeyinde ilginç bir yapı keşfedildi. Tanımlanamayan bir tabiata sahip, zayıf bir radyasyon yayıyor. Bunun haricinde alametler, gezegenin yüzeyinde herhangi bir aktivite kaydetmeyi başaramadı. Diğer nitelikleriyle birlikte değerlendirecek olursak bu gezegeni bir ölü dünya olarak sınıflandırabiliriz. Gerekli gördüğünüz takdirde bu yapının yanına iniş yapabilmek mümkün."
languages.original_text: "A peculiar structure was discovered on the surface of one of the local worlds. It is emitting weak radiation of an unidentified nature, but aside from that, the augurs have failed to register any activity on the surface of the planet. In conjunction with its other features, it would be feasible to classify this planet as a dead world. It is possible to land next to the edifice if you deem this necessary."
